title: coreyquestions
body:
{Player}
[[Ask when he noticed the change.|corey1]]
[[What does he think happened?|corey2]]
[[Move on|null|CoreyCareyInterlude]]

title: corey1
body:
{JoeyDinger}
So Corey, when did you first notice something was different about your brother?

[[...|corey1answer]]
<<CharExpression|happy>>

title: corey2
corey1answer
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
That’s easy, Joey. It was the first week back after the trip. I sent Carey a Snapchat and he didn’t even open it.

[[...|corey1answer2]]
<<CharExpression|neutral>>

title: corey2answer
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
I think maybe he could have hit his head. I didn’t see him do it, but there was this time when he disappeared for like an hour, so he could have done it then. 

[[...|corey2answer2]]
<<CharExpression|sad>>

title: corey1answer2
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
When I asked him if he’d seen it, he said, “What’s a Snapchat?” and then started talking about how he can’t keep up with all these new words and 
the rent is too high.

[[Continue|coreyquestions]]

title: corey2answer2
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
Maybe he ate some bad sandwich and got a parasite. I heard they can really mess with your brain.

[[Continue|coreyquestions]]
<<CharExpression|mad>>
